Ynys Recreation Ground, Aberdare, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £8 and cup, 2nd £5, 3rd £2. March contest - 1st Windsor Colliery, 2nd Llwydcoed. 5 bands competed.
